post.description: Given query face's faceId, to search the similar-looking faces from a faceId array, a face list or a large face list.

faceId.description: faceId of the face, comes from Face - Detect.

maxNumOfCandidatesReturned.description: The number of top similar faces returned. The valid range is [1, 1000].It defaults to 20.

mode.description: Similar face searching mode. It can be 'matchPerson' or 'matchFace'. It defaults to 'matchPerson'.

faceIds.description: An array of candidate faceIds. All of them are created by Face - Detect and the faceIds will expire 24 hours after the detection call. The number of faceIds is limited to 1000.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

post.description: Divide candidate faces into groups based on face similarity.

faceIds.description: Array of candidate faceId created by Face - Detect. The maximum is 1000 faces.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

post.description: A remote procedure call (RPC) operation.

faceIds.description: Array of query faces faceIds, created by the Face - Detect. Each of the faces are identified independently. The valid number of faceIds is between [1, 10].

personGroupId.description: Id of the target person group, created by PersonGroup - Create.

maxNumOfCandidatesReturned.description: The range of maxNumOfCandidatesReturned is between 1 and 100 (default is 10).

confidenceThreshold.description: Customized identification confidence threshold, in the range of [0, 1]. Advanced user can tweak this value to override default internal threshold for better precision on their scenario data. Note there is no guarantee of this threshold value working on other data and after algorithm updates.

post.description: Given query face's faceId, to search the similar-looking faces from a faceId array, a face list or a large face list.

faceId.description: faceId of the face, comes from Face - Detect.

maxNumOfCandidatesReturned.description: The number of top similar faces returned. The valid range is [1, 1000].It defaults to 20.

mode.description: Similar face searching mode. It can be 'matchPerson' or 'matchFace'. It defaults to 'matchPerson'.

faceListId.description: An existing user-specified unique candidate face list, created in FaceList - Create. Face list contains a set of persistedFaceIds which are persisted and will never expire.

post.description: Given query face's faceId, to search the similar-looking faces from a faceId array, a face list or a large face list.

faceId.description: faceId of the face, comes from Face - Detect.

maxNumOfCandidatesReturned.description: The number of top similar faces returned. The valid range is [1, 1000].It defaults to 20.

mode.description: Similar face searching mode. It can be 'matchPerson' or 'matchFace'. It defaults to 'matchPerson'.

largeFaceListId.description: An existing user-specified unique candidate large face list, created in LargeFaceList - Create. Large face list contains a set of persistedFaceIds which are persisted and will never expire.

faceIds.description: Array of query faces faceIds, created by the Face - Detect. Each of the faces are identified independently. The valid number of faceIds is between [1, 10].

dynamicPersonGroupId.description: Id of the target PersonDirectory DynamicPersonGroup to match against.

maxNumOfCandidatesReturned.description: The range of maxNumOfCandidatesReturned is between 1 and 100 (default is 10).

confidenceThreshold.description: Customized identification confidence threshold, in the range of [0, 1]. Advanced user can tweak this value to override default internal threshold for better precision on their scenario data. AADToken.description: The Azure Active Directory OAuth2 Flow

AccessoryItem.description: Accessory item and corresponding confidence level.

confidence.description: Confidence level of the accessory type. Range between [0,1].

AddFaceFromUrlContent.description: Model for add face by url.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

values.name: Canceled
values.description: The operation has been canceled by the user.

userData.description: User-provided data attached to the face. The size limit is 1KB.

name.description: User defined name, maximum length is 128.

userData.description: Optional user defined data. Length should not exceed 16KB.

recognitionModel.description: Name of recognition model. Recognition model is used when the face features are extracted and associated with detected faceIds. The default value is 'recognition_01', if latest model needed, please explicitly specify the model you need.

name.description: User defined name, maximum length is 128.

userData.description: Optional user defined data. Length should not exceed 16KB.

recognitionModel.description: Name of recognition model. Recognition model is used when the face features are extracted and associated with detected faceIds. The default value is 'recognition_01', if latest model needed, please explicitly specify the model you need.

name.description: User defined name, maximum length is 128.

userData.description: Optional user defined data. Length should not exceed 16KB.

persistedFaceIds.description: Face ids of registered faces in the person.

BlurProperties.description: Properties describing any presence of blur within the image.

blurLevel.description: An enum value indicating level of blurriness.

value.description: A number indicating level of blurriness ranging from 0 to 1.

CreateDynamicPersonGroupContent.description: Request of create dynamic person group.

dynamicPersonGroupId.description: ID of the dynamic person group.

name.description: User defined name, maximum length is 128.

userData.description: Optional user defined data. Length should not exceed 16KB.

addPersonIds.description: Array of personIds created by PersonDirectory Person - Create to add.

DetectionModel.description: The detection model for the face.

values.name: detection_01
values.description: The default detection model for Face - Detect. Recommend for near frontal face detection. For scenarios with exceptionally large angle (head-pose) faces, occluded faces or wrong image orientation, the faces in such cases may not be detected.

values.name: detection_02
values.description: Detection model released in 2019 May with improved accuracy especially on small, side and blurry faces.

values.name: detection_03
values.description: Detection model released in 2021 February with improved accuracy especially on small faces.

DynamicPersonGroup.description: A container that references PersonDirectory Person - Create.

dynamicPersonGroupId.description: ID of the dynamic person group.

name.description: User defined name, maximum length is 128.

userData.description: Optional user defined data. Length should not exceed 16KB.

ExposureProperties.description: Properties describing exposure level of the image.

exposureLevel.description: An enum value indicating level of exposure.

value.description: A number indicating level of exposure level ranging from 0 to 1. [0, 0.25) is under exposure. [0.25, 0.75) is good exposure. [0.75, 1] is over exposure.

FaceAttributes.description: Face attributes for the detected face.

glasses.description: Glasses type if any of the face.

occlusion.description: Properties describing occlusions on a given face.

accessories.description: Properties describing any accessories on a given face.

blur.description: Properties describing any presence of blur within the image.

exposure.description: Properties describing exposure level of the image.

noise.description: Properties describing noise level of the image.

mask.description: Properties describing the presence of a mask on a given face.

qualityForRecognition.description: Properties describing the overall image quality regarding whether the image being used in the detection is of sufficient quality to attempt face recognition on.

faceId.description: Unique faceId of the detected face, created by detection API and it will expire 24 hours after the detection call.

recognitionModel.description: The 'recognitionModel' associated with this faceId. This is only returned when 'returnRecognitionModel' is explicitly set as true.

faceRectangle.description: A rectangle area for the face location on image.

faceLandmarks.description: An array of 27-point face landmarks pointing to the important positions of face components. To return this, it requires 'returnFaceLandmarks' parameter to be true.

FaceFindSimilarResult.description: Response body for find similar face operation.

confidence.description: Confidence value of the candidate. The higher confidence, the more similar. Range between [0,1].

faceId.description: faceId of candidate face when find by faceIds.

persistedFaceId.description: PersistedFaceId of candidate face when find by faceListId.

FaceGroupingResult.description: Response body for group face operation.

groups.description: A partition of the original faces based on face similarity. Groups are ranked by number of faces.

messyGroup.description: Face ids array of faces that cannot find any similar faces from original faces.

confidence.description: Confidence value of the candidate. The higher confidence, the more similar. Range between [0,1].

faceId.description: Face ID of the query face.

candidates.description: The top candidate returned from the database.

FaceLandmarks.description: A collection of 27-point face landmarks pointing to the important positions of face components.

FaceList.description: Face list is a list of faces, up to 1,000 faces.

name.description: User defined name, maximum length is 128.

userData.description: Optional user defined data. Length should not exceed 16KB.

recognitionModel.description: Name of recognition model. Recognition model is used when the face features are extracted and associated with detected faceIds. The default value is 'recognition_01', if latest model needed, please explicitly specify the model you need.

persistedFaces.description: Face ids of registered faces in the face list.

userData.description: User-provided data attached to the face. The size limit is 1KB.

FaceListUpdate.description: Face list is a list of faces, up to 1,000 faces.

name.description: User defined name, maximum length is 128.

userData.description: Optional user defined data. Length should not exceed 16KB.

FaceOperationStatus.description: Long running operation resource for person directory.

createdDateTime.description: Date and time the operation was created.

finishedDateTime.description: Date and time the operation was finished.

FaceRectangle.description: A rectangle within which a face can be found.

top.description: The distance from the top edge if the image to the top edge of the rectangle, in pixels.

left.description: The distance from the left edge if the image to the left edge of the rectangle, in pixels.

width.description: The width of the rectangle, in pixels.

height.description: The height of the rectangle, in pixels.

FaceSessionStatus.description: The current status of the session.

isIdentical.description: True if the two faces belong to the same person or the face belongs to the person, otherwise false.

confidence.description: Confidence score of whether the two faces belong to the same person or whether the face belongs to the person. The range is [0, 1].

moustache.description: A number ranging from 0 to 1 indicating a level of confidence associated with a property.

beard.description: A number ranging from 0 to 1 indicating a level of confidence associated with a property.

sideburns.description: A number ranging from 0 to 1 indicating a level of confidence associated with a property.

HairColor.description: An array of candidate colors and confidence level in the presence of each.

confidence.description: Confidence level of the color. Range between [0,1].

bald.description: A number describing confidence level of whether the person is bald.

invisible.description: A boolean value describing whether the hair is visible in the image.

hairColor.description: An array of candidate colors and confidence level in the presence of each.

KeyAuth.description: The secret key for your Azure AI Face subscription.

name.description: name of the API key

LargeFaceList.description: Large face list is a list of faces, up to 1,000,000 faces.

name.description: User defined name, maximum length is 128.

userData.description: Optional user defined data. Length should not exceed 16KB.

MaskProperties.description: Properties describing the presence of a mask on a given face.

noseAndMouthCovered.description: A boolean value indicating whether nose and mouth are covered.

type.description: Mask type if any of the face

MaskType.description: Mask type if any of the face

values.name: otherMaskOrOcclusion
values.description: Other types of mask or occlusion.

NameAndUserData.description: Model for object name and user data.

name.description: User defined name, maximum length is 128.

userData.description: Optional user defined data. Length should not exceed 16KB.

NoiseProperties.description: Properties describing noise level of the image.

noiseLevel.description: An enum value indicating level of noise.

value.description: A number indicating level of noise level ranging from 0 to 1. [0, 0.25) is under exposure. [0.25, 0.75) is good exposure. [0.75, 1] is over exposure. [0, 0.3) is low noise level. [0.3, 0.7) is medium noise level. [0.7, 1] is high noise level.

OcclusionProperties.description: Properties describing occlusions on a given face.

foreheadOccluded.description: A boolean value indicating whether forehead is occluded.

eyeOccluded.description: A boolean value indicating whether eyes are occluded.

mouthOccluded.description: A boolean value indicating whether the mouth is occluded.

QualityForRecognition.description: Indicates quality of image for recognition.

RecognitionModel.description: The recognition model for the face.

values.name: recognition_01
values.description: The default recognition model for Face - Detect. All those faceIds created before 2019 March are bonded with this recognition model.

values.name: recognition_04
values.description: Recognition model released in 2021 February. It's recommended to use this recognition model for better recognition accuracy.

statusCode.description: The HTTP status code of the request.

createdDateTime.description: A combined UTC date and time string that describes the created time of the person group, large person group or large face list.

lastActionDateTime.description: A combined UTC date and time string that describes the last modify time of the person group, large person group or large face list, could be null value when the group is not successfully trained.

lastSuccessfulTrainingDateTime.description: A combined UTC date and time string that describes the last successful training time of the person group, large person group or large face list.

message.description: Show failure message when training failed (omitted when training succeed).

UpdateDynamicPersonGroupContent.description: Request of update dynamic person group.

name.description: User defined name, maximum length is 128.

userData.description: Optional user defined data. Length should not exceed 16KB.

addPersonIds.description: Array of personIds created by PersonDirectory Person - Create to add.

removePersonIds.description: Array of personIds created by PersonDirectory Person - Create to remove.

AddFaceOptions.detectionModel.name: detectionModel
AddFaceOptions.detectionModel.description: The 'detectionModel' associated with the detected faceIds. Supported 'detectionModel' values include 'detection_01', 'detection_02' and 'detection_03'. The default value is 'detection_01'.

values.name: detection_01
values.description: The default detection model for Face - Detect. Recommend for near frontal face detection. For scenarios with exceptionally large angle (head-pose) faces, occluded faces or wrong image orientation, the faces in such cases may not be detected.

values.name: detection_02
values.description: Detection model released in 2019 May with improved accuracy especially on small, side and blurry faces.

values.name: detection_03
values.description: Detection model released in 2021 February with improved accuracy especially on small faces.

AddFaceOptions.targetFace.name: targetFace
AddFaceOptions.targetFace.description: A face rectangle to specify the target face to be added to a person, in the format of 'targetFace=left,top,width,height'.

AddFaceOptions.userData.name: userData
AddFaceOptions.userData.description: User-provided data attached to the face. The size limit is 1KB.

ApiVersionPathParameter.name: apiVersion
ApiVersionPathParameter.description: The API version to use for this operation.

FaceDetectionOptions.detectionModel.name: detectionModel
FaceDetectionOptions.detectionModel.description: The 'detectionModel' associated with the detected faceIds.

values.name: detection_01
values.description: The default detection model for Face - Detect. Recommend for near frontal face detection. For scenarios with exceptionally large angle (head-pose) faces, occluded faces or wrong image orientation, the faces in such cases may not be detected.

values.name: detection_02
values.description: Detection model released in 2019 May with improved accuracy especially on small, side and blurry faces.

values.name: detection_03
values.description: Detection model released in 2021 February with improved accuracy especially on small faces.

FaceDetectionOptions.faceIdTimeToLive.name: faceIdTimeToLive
FaceDetectionOptions.faceIdTimeToLive.description: The number of seconds for the face ID being cached. Supported range from 60 seconds up to 86400 seconds. The default value is 86400 (24 hours).

FaceDetectionOptions.recognitionModel.name: recognitionModel
FaceDetectionOptions.recognitionModel.description: The 'recognitionModel' associated with the detected faceIds.

values.name: recognition_01
values.description: The default recognition model for Face - Detect. All those faceIds created before 2019 March are bonded with this recognition model.

values.name: recognition_04
values.description: Recognition model released in 2021 February. It's recommended to use this recognition model for better recognition accuracy.

FaceDetectionOptions.returnFaceAttribute.name: returnFaceAttributes
FaceDetectionOptions.returnFaceAttribute.description: Analyze and return the one or more specified face attributes in the comma-separated string like 'returnFaceAttributes=headPose,glasses'. Supported face attributes include headPose, glasses, occlusion, accessories, blur, exposure, noise, mask, and qualityForRecognition. Face attribute analysis has additional computational and time cost.

FaceDetectionOptions.returnFaceId.name: returnFaceId
FaceDetectionOptions.returnFaceId.description: Return faceIds of the detected faces or not. The default value is true.

FaceDetectionOptions.returnFaceLandmarks.name: returnFaceLandmarks
FaceDetectionOptions.returnFaceLandmarks.description: Return face landmarks of the detected faces or not. The default value is false.

FaceDetectionOptions.returnRecognitionMo.name: returnRecognitionModel
FaceDetectionOptions.returnRecognitionMo.description: Return 'recognitionModel' or not. The default value is false.

ListRequestOptions.start.name: start
ListRequestOptions.start.description: List resources greater than the "start". It contains no more than 64 characters. Default is empty.

ListRequestOptions.top.name: top
ListRequestOptions.top.description: The number of items to list, ranging in [1, 1000]. Default is 1000.

ReturnRecognitionModelOptions.name: returnRecognitionModel
ReturnRecognitionModelOptions.description: Return 'recognitionModel' or not. The default value is false.
